name: avant-vtt
description: A narrative RPG system for FoundryVTT

scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:scss:dist && npm run build:ts && npm run build:packs && npm run ci:validate && npm run validate:partials && npm run validate:templates
scripts.build:dist: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:scss && npm run build:ts && npm run build:packs
scripts.guard:deprecated: npm run lint:deadcode && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const violations = []; const scanFiles = (dir) => { if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) return; fs.readdirSync(dir, { withFileTypes: true }).forEach(dirent => { if (dirent.isDirectory()) scanFiles(path.join(dir, dirent.name)); else if (dirent.name.match(/\.(js|ts)$/)) { const content = fs.readFileSync(path.join(dir, dirent.name), 'utf8'); if (content.includes('RemoteTraitService')) violations.push(path.join(dir, dirent.name)); } }); }; scanFiles('scripts'); if (violations.length > 0) { console.error('❌ Found RemoteTraitService imports in:', violations.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ No deprecated service imports found'); }"
